Title: A Special Day
Writer: Claudio Bigagli (novel), Francesca Comencini (story), Giulia Calenda (story), Francesca Comencini (screenplay), Giulia Calenda (screenplay), Davide Lantieri (screenplay)
Actors: Filippo Scicchitano, Giulia Valentini, Roberto Infascelli, Antonio Zavatteri
Plot: Gina and Marco are living in the suburbs of Rome. The two meet on a very special day: their first day at work. They have a future that awaits them and really seems at hand. Gina is about to...
